data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=EkMrscxA4_UQ7kNvgFRgbHD&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCg6LSGJ3ZzOVeedJUWafudO0NeABmHDqAr9ma03VGGdQ&oe=66471B4C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=M2zObkuXZQMQ7kNvgGEyn8N&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD6hxkhBi5fw53izgXbicF-E3FrVExErITQyZaJieIo3A&oe=6647519F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035339_749541023684513_3682281630778817377_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=6rNBxWa77BYQ7kNvgGFAEnd&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBT4RCPK5yj_zaNZalkTvBtkIF1kVoa5tYtlpt4XKvQFQ&oe=66475024)
